channel.title: Reading on yuanxil
channel.description: Recent content in Reading on yuanxil

item.title: 阅读清单
item.description: January 总结 0101 ★★★★★ 我的精神家园 0103 ★★★★☆ 幽默且超前 死在午后 0111 ★★★★★ 阳光下的沙场，我几乎要爱上斗牛了… Crying in H Mart 0114 ★★★★☆ The opening was good, but it turned into her memoir. Anyway, it’s touching. 瘟疫之夜 0116 ★★★★☆ 很难说这本书的内容是否过于冗长，因为它给我的阅读体验还算不错。我注意到了它表达的新意，以及想要囊括的内容，但是它并没有真正撑起来。 Invisible Women 0117 ★★★★★ It is said that women are not suitable for SOMETHING. But SOMETHING is not considered for women at all. With tons of data, this book is readable and worth reading.
